name: Slimes Against Humanity
description:
Push Slimes in the Grinders for points! Capture Slimes with your Grappling Hook to use their powers!

Controls:

  • WASD to Move
  • Mouse to Look
  • Space to Jump
  • Right-Click to Hook
  • Left-Click To Use Slime

Made by Charlie Fletcher and Matthew Redmond

Charlie's Portfolio: https://code-fletcher.com/
